00004 module snow

00011 
00012 function snow_depth_in(rTAvg)  result(rSnowDepth)
00013 
00014   ! returns snow depth for fresh snow on the basis of the National
00015   ! Weather Service table "Approximate snowfall amounts at
00016   ! specified temperature ranges"
00017 
00018   real(kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rTAvg
00019 
00020   ! [ LOCALS ]
00021   real(kind=T_SGL) :: rSnowDepth
00022 
00023   rSnowDepth = 30.0_T_DBL &
00024      * exp(-0.04_T_DBL * REAL(rTAvg,kind=T_DBL))
00025 
00026   return
00027 
00028 end function snow_depth_in

00030 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 
00032 function snow_depth_Hedstrom(rTAvg, pConfig)   result(rSnowDepth)
00033 
00034   ! returns fresh snow depth in inches, per inch of liquid precipitation
00035   real(kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rTAvg
00036   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00037                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00038 
00039   ! [ LOCALS ]
00040   real(kind=T_SGL) :: rSnowDepth
00041   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rRhoS                       ! density of fresh snow in kg/m^3
00042   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rRhoW = 1000.0   ! density of water in kg/m^3
00043 
00044   ! ensure that Hedstrom and Pomeroy's equation (1998) stays within reasonable values
00045 !  rRhoS = MIN(MAX(50.,67.9 + 51.3 * exp(FtoC(rTAvg)/2.6)),130.)
00046   rRhoS = MIN(MAX(50.,pConfig%rSNWD_intcp1 + pConfig%rSNWD_slp1 &
00047              * exp(FtoC(rTAvg)/ pConfig%rSNWD_denom)),130.)
00048 
00049   rSnowDepth = rRhoW / rRhoS
00050 
00051   return
00052 
00053 end function snow_depth_Hedstrom

00055 !!***
00056 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 !!****f* meteorological_functions/snow_energy_balance
00058 ! NAME
00059 !   snow_energy_balance - estimates snow energy_balance
00060 !
00061 ! SYNOPSIS
00062 !   Estimates snow energy balance in kJ per square meter per day
00063 !
00064 ! INPUTS
00065 !
00066 ! OUTPUTS
00067 !
00068 ! NOTES
00069 
00070 subroutine snow_energy_balance(rTMin, rTMax, rTAvg, rRs, rRso, rAlbedo, &
00071    rSnowcover, rNetPrecip, rSnowTemperature, rMeltAmount, i, j)
00072 
00073   real (kind=T_SGL)::  rTMin
00074   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rTMax
00075   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rTAvg
00076   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rRs
00077   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rRso
00078   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rAlbedo
00079   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rSnowcover
00080   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rNetPrecip
00081   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rSnowTemperature
00082   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rMeltAmount
00083   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rMeltPotential
00084   integer (kind=T_INT) :: i,j
00085 
00086   ! [ LOCALS ]
00087   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rSn                   ! net shortwave radiation
00088   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rLn                   ! net longwave radiation
00089   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rH                    ! sensible heat exchange
00090   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rE                    ! convective heat exchange
00091   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rG = 173.  ! ground heat, kj per square meter
00092   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rP                    ! precipitation heat exchange
00093   real(kind=T_SGL) :: rSWE
00094   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rDeltaT
00095   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rDeltaSWE
00096   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rSnowTemp_degC
00097   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rTMin_C
00098   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rNetEnergy
00099   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rT_RiseEnergy
00100   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rMeltEnergy
00101   real (kind=T_DBL), parameter :: rCsnow = 2.1  ! kJ per kg per deg C
00102                                                 ! snow heat capacity
00103 
00104   real (kind=T_DBL), parameter :: rLambda = 3.35E+05  ! kJ per cubic meter per deg C
00105                                                       ! latent heat of fusion
00106 
00107   ! Snowcover is in INCHES SWE; we need METERS SWE
00108 
00109   rSWE = rSnowCover / 12.0 *.3048
00110   rTMin_C = FtoC(rTMin)
00111   rSnowTemp_degC = FtoC(rSnowTemperature)
00112 
00113   ! all component energy values must be in kJ per square meter per day
00114   ! radiation components must be multiplied by 1000 since they are returned
00115   ! in MJ per square meters per day
00116   rSn = net_shortwave_radiation_Rns(rRs, rAlbedo) * 1000_T_DBL
00117   rLn = net_longwave_radiation_Rnl(rTMin, rTMax, rRs, rRso) * 1000_T_DBL
00118   rH = sensible_heat_exchange_h(rSnowTemperature, rTAvg)
00119   rE = convective_heat_exchange_e(rSnowTemperature, rTAvg)
00120   rP = precipitation_heat_p(rNetPrecip, rTAvg)
00121 
00122   if(i==3 .and. j==3) then
00123     write(*,fmt="(' rSnowTemperature (input): ',F14.4)") rSnowTemperature
00124     write(*,fmt="(' rSWE (input) : ',F14.4)") rSWE
00125   end if
00126 
00127   if(rSWE > 0) then  ! we have snow and should do the calculations
00128 
00129     rNetEnergy = ( rSn - rLn + rH + rE + rG + rP )
00130     rDeltaT = 0.01 * rNetEnergy / (rSWE * rCsnow * 1000.)
00131 
00132   if(i==3 .and. j==3) then
00133     write(*,fmt="(' rNetEnergy : ',F14.4)") rNetEnergy
00134     write(*,fmt="(' rDeltaT : ',F14.4)") rDeltaT
00135   end if
00136 
00137 
00138     if(rNetEnergy < 0.) then  ! insufficient energy is available for snowmelt
00139                               ! snowpack temperature decreases
00140 
00141       if(i==3 .and. j==3) print *, '  snowpack temp DECREASES'
00142       rSnowTemp_degC = rSnowTemp_degC + rDeltaT
00143       if( rSnowTemp_degC > 0.) rSnowTemp_degC = 0.
00144       if(rSnowTemp_degC < rTMin_C) rSnowTemp_degC = rTMin_C
00145       rMeltAmount = 0.
00146       ! now recalculate rDeltaT after constraints applied to rSnowTemp_degC
00147       rDeltaT = FtoC(rSnowTemperature) - rSnowTemp_degC
00148     else ! excess energy added to snowpack; possible snowmelt
00149 
00150       if(rSnowTemp_degC + rDeltaT > 0.) then ! more energy added to snowpack than
00151                                              ! it can absorb; melting occurs
00152         if(i==3 .and. j==3) print *, '  snowpack temp DECREASES; MELTING OCCURS'
00153 
00154         rT_RiseEnergy = (rSWE * rCsnow * 1000. ) * ABS( rSnowTemp_degC )
00155         rSnowTemp_degC = 0.
00156         rMeltEnergy = rNetEnergy - rT_RiseEnergy
00157         rMeltPotential = rMeltEnergy / (333.3 * 1000.)
00158         rDeltaSWE = MIN(rSWE,rMeltPotential)
00159         rMeltAmount = ABS(rDeltaSWE) / 0.3048 * 12.
00160         rSnowcover = MAX(rSnowcover - rMeltAmount,rZERO)
00161 
00162       else  ! sufficient energy to raise snowpack temperature, but no snowmelt occurs
00163         if(i==3 .and. j==3) print *, '  snowpack temp INCREASES'
00164         rMeltAmount = 0.
00165         rSnowTemp_degC = rSnowTemp_degC + rDeltaT
00166 
00167       end if
00168     end if
00169   else
00170     rMeltAmount = 0.
00171     rSnowcover = 0.
00172   end if
00173 
00174   rSnowTemperature = CtoF(rSnowTemp_degC)
00175 
00176   return
00177 
00178 end subroutine snow_energy_balance

00180 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 !!****f* meteorological_functions/snow_albedo
00182 ! NAME
00183 !   snow_albedo - estimates snow albedo
00184 !
00185 ! SYNOPSIS
00186 !   Estimates snow albedo given number of days since last snowfall
00187 !
00188 ! INPUTS
00189 !   rAlbedoInit - initial albedo when snow first falls
00190 !   iNumDaysLastSnow - number of days since the last snowfall took place
00191 !   rZenithAngle - solar zenith angle at noon
00192 !
00193 ! OUTPUTS
00194 !   rAlbedo - current albedo of snow surface
00195 !
00196 ! NOTES
00197 !
00198 !  Implemented as equation 13-15, Kustas et al, 1994
00199 !
00200 !   Reference:
00201 !      Kustas, W.P., Rango, A. and Uijlenhoet, R., A simple energy
00202 !          budget algorithm for the snowmelt runoff model:
00203 !          Water Resources Research, v. 30, no. 5.
00204 !
00205 ! SOURCE
00206 
00207 function snow_albedo(rAlbedoInit, iNumDaysLastSnow, rZenithAngle)  result(rAlbedo)
00208 
00209   real (kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rAlbedoInit
00210   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iNumDaysLastSnow
00211   real (kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rZenithAngle
00212 
00213   ! [ LOCALS ]
00214   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rAlbedo
00215   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rSnowGrainSize
00216   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rSnowGrainSizeBeforeMelting = 0.25 ! millimeters
00217 
00218   rSnowGrainSize = (rSnowGrainSizeBeforeMelting * rSnowGrainSizeBeforeMelting &
00219                      * rSnowGrainSizeBeforeMelting &
00220                        + 0.252_T_SGL * REAL(iNumDaysLastSnow))**0.3333333_T_DBL
00221 
00222   rAlbedo = rAlbedoInit - (0.083_T_SGL + 0.23_T_SGL * sqrt(rSnowGrainSize)) &
00223                             * sqrt(cos(rZenithAngle))
00224 
00225   return
00226 
00227 end function snow_albedo
